explains: n. 兰科植物，兰花；淡紫色

sentences.en: He did indeed import flowers and sell them to other orchid-lovers.
sentences.cn: 他确实进口了一些兰花，然后卖给其他兰花爱好者。

sentences.en: Orchids and orchid bees are a classic example of this relationship.
sentences.cn: 兰花和兰蜂就是这种关系的典型例子。

sentences.en: He then announced that the person who grew the most beautiful orchid would take his throne.
sentences.cn: 然后他宣布谁能种出最漂亮的兰花，谁就继承他的王位。
